title: LLVM assertion using bare self value

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
``` rust
trait FTErrorMethods {
    fn succeeded(self) -> bool;
}

impl FTErrorMethods for int {
    fn succeeded(self) -> bool { self == 0 }
}

fn main() {
    5.succeeded();
}
```

```
rustc: /run/media/jdm/ssd/rust/src/llvm/lib/VMCore/Instructions.cpp:2383: static llvm::CastInst* llvm::CastInst::CreatePointerCast(llvm::Value*, llvm::Type*, const llvm::Twine&, llvm::Instruction*): Assertion `S->getType()->isPointerTy() && "Invalid cast"' failed.
```
